FAQ¶

1. What are GFF and GTF format used in featurExtract?¶

A General Feature Format (GFF) file is a simple tab-delimited text file for describing genomic features. There are several slightly but significantly different GFF file formats. The featurExtract supports the GFF3 and GTF file formats.

2. What is type in feature colmun?¶

GenoKit
